resources.string:
All the users of eCounselling application are expected to comply with the following terms and conditions

 ●	Acceptance of Terms and Conditions of Use Agreement.
This agreement is an electronic contract that establishes the legally binding terms you must accept to use the service.
This agreement includes the:
i)	The Privacy Policy and
ii)	our Safety Guidelines.
 By accessing or using the services, you accept this agreement and agree to the terms and conditions provided to you in electronic form.
 ●	Eligibility.
The service is not intended for children under 13 years of age for a dating related services.
 ●	Do not share your personal details such as contact number, location etc.. to the strangers.
 ●	Do not give hints like dates.
 ●	Termination \-
You may disable your account at any time, for any reason, by following the instructions in "Settings" in the service.
 ●	Account Security.
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of username and password you designate during the registration process, and you are solely responsible for all activities that occur your username and password. If any unauthorized use of username and password, you can contact at the following emails ecounsellingbhutan2018@gmail.com and ensure that you log out from your account at the end of each session.
 ●	Interactions with other users.
You are solely responsible for your interaction with other users

Mental Health Gap Action Programme (mhGAP) aims at scaling up services for mental, neurological and substance use disorders for countries especially with low- and middle-income. The programme asserts that with proper care, psychosocial assistance and medication, tens of millions could be treated for depression, schizophrenia, and epilepsy, prevented from suicide and begin to lead normal livesâ€“ even where resources are scarce. One of the main pyschological problem is depression. And in this section, you can test yourself as a series of questions will be asked.
